tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE price_history (
  history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_id INT,
  old_price DECIMAL(10,2),
  new_price DECIMAL(10,2),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE availability_history (
  history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_id INT,
  old_stock_quantity INT,
  new_stock_quantity INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
